mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pay WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no} ORDER BY pay_no DESC Limit 1;
SELECT * FROM pay WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no} and usr_id = #{usr_id} ORDER BY pay_no DESC Limit 1;
SELECT cmn_cd_pay_stt FROM pay WHERE rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no} AND usr_id = #{usr_id} ORDER BY pay_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay(pay_no, rsvt_no, prd_dtl_cd, usr_id, imp_uid, pay_prc, pay_date, cmn_cd_pay_appr, cmn_cd_pay_stt, pay_mthd, used_mlg) VALUES (#{pay_no}, #{rsvt_no}, #{prd_dtl_cd}, #{usr_id}, #{imp_uid}, #{pay_prc},#{pay_date}, #{cmn_cd_pay_appr}, #{cmn_cd_pay_stt}, #{pay_mthd}, #{used_mlg})
mapper.select: SELECT r.rsvt_date, r.rsvt_no, r.prd_dtl_cd, r.cmn_cd_pay_stt, r.sum_prc, tp.prd_nm, tp.prd_dtl_desc, p.pay_no, p.pay_prc, p.used_mlg, pi.img_pth FROM rsvt r JOIN trv_prd tp ON r.prd_cd = tp.prd_cd JOIN pay p ON r.rsvt_no = p.rsvt_no JOIN prd_img pi ON r.prd_cd = pi.prd_cd WHERE r.rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no}
